scenario.name: Custom Code Injection! - Test #5
scenario.description: This scenario includes Interface and SuperClass inherited, and import statement with the CustomCode!

note.text:
No steps actually tested here, you can check the Java console output.
This is just an example to show the ability of implement Java interfaces.
Note: you can implement many interfaces (but 'at least currently' you can't override their methods

custom.title: CustomSuperClass
custom.code: System.out.println("I'm just an example, you can extend any other class..");
